Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde were brought to their knees in Group C's opening match against Egypt, who claimed a 3-0 win at the Cairo International Stadium.
Cape Verde defeated Mauritania 1-0 when the sides last met.
Mauritania were stretched by Botswana in their opener in Group C but managed to snatch a lone-goal win late in the game.
In the 2023 Afcon in Cote Dâ€™Ivoire, Mauritania reached the round of 16, their best record so far in the competition.
